description: A replacement mixed pick for Black Diamond™ interchangeable-pick ice tools. Made for drytooling, its aggressive front teeth aid hooking and a thick design adds durability and strength. The serrated top edge won't slip when cammed.Made of hot-forged chromoly steel.3-degrees steeper pick angle than previous model.T-rated – thicker and stronger than B-rated picks, but displaces more ice.Sold individually.
name: Black Diamond Hot Forged Mixed Pick
